author: tomj
msg: - We now throw the correct expcetion object on the client.
- The java class name of fault is put in the Detail of the SOAP fault so the client can map it.
- Add getExceptionName() method to Utils to centralize fault/exception name mapping
- The exception name is derived from the fault Message name instead of the fault name (per JAX-RPC 0.5)
Hopefully this will change in the next draft.
- Move the stack trace of an AxisFault to the Detail section.
- Change emitter to emit fault exception classes even when --skeleton switch is not on.
- Use Constants instead of string literals for soap fault sections.

author: tomj
msg: Add Fault test case to WSDL test suite.

author: butek
msg: Fixed a couple bugs dims found with his new WSDL for UDDI.
1.  The WSDL has a variable named "true" which wasn't being mangled.
2.  A leftover bug from my change of Parameter.type from String to Type.

author: dims
msg: Added 2 wsdl's for UDDI 1.0  (BUTcommented out for now).

author: gdaniels
msg: Add AxisServerFactory to do default server creation pattern, incl. JNDI
Revamp AxisServlet to use AxisServerFactory (see comments in there
